citations.title: Federated Learning for Smart Grid: A Survey on Applications and Challenges
A Federated DRL Approach for Smart Micro-Grid Energy Management
Federated reinforcement learning for sustainable and cost-efficient energy management (overview)
Bonawitz et al., Practical Secure Aggregation for Federated Learning
A Practical Guide to Machine Learning with Differential Privacy
Safe Reinforcement Learning for Power System Control: A Review
CityLearn: A Tutorial on RL Control for Grid-Interactive Buildings
Conformal Off-Policy Evaluation in Markov Decision Processes
Membership Inference Attacks and Defenses in Federated Learning: A Survey
When the Curious Abandon Honesty: Federated Learning Is Not Private
Non-IID Data in Federated Learning: A Survey with Taxonomy and Insights
Lam et al., Gradient Disaggregation: Breaking Privacy in Federated Learning
